text:
Your best option is to use javascript to control the items, I included a few scripts below:

 - [http://info.wsisiz.edu.pl/~suszynsk/jQuery/demos/jquery-selectbox/][1]
   
 - [http://brilliantretail.com/cases/select/][2]
   
 - [http://www.emblematiq.com/projects/niceforms/][3]

I've only ever used the first, but I hope they meet your needs.


  [1]: http://info.wsisiz.edu.pl/~suszynsk/jQuery/demos/jquery-selectbox/
  [2]: http://brilliantretail.com/cases/select/
  [3]: http://www.emblematiq.com/projects/niceforms/
